channel.title: Astronomer of the Day
channel.description: RSS feed of the astronomer of the day.

item.title: Neta Bahcall
item.description: Neta Bahcall (Hebrew: נטע אסף בקל; born 1942) is an Israeli astrophysicist and cosmologist specializing in dark matter, the structure of the universe, quasars, and the formation of galaxies. Bahcall is the Eugene Higgins Professor of Astronomy at Princeton University.
